books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: The unforgettable novel of a childhood in a sleepy Southern town and the crisis of conscience that rocked it.

books.title: Fahrenheit 451
books.description: The terrifyingly prophetic novel of a post-literate future.

books.title: Little Fires Everywhere
books.description: From the bestselling author of Everything I Never Told You, a riveting novel that traces the intertwined fates of the picture-perfect Richardson family and the enigmatic mother and daughter who upend their lives.
